Deprecate add_listener, add_block_listener and respond_to

deprecate aliases in preparation for version 2

* deprecate `respond_to` in favour of `on`
* deprecate `add_block_listener` in favour of `on`
* rename `with` to `subscribe` in TemporaryListeners
* rename `add` with `subscribe` in GlobalListeners
* Move parsing of options from arguments in GlobalListeners
add an alternative way of mapping events [skip ci]

Add use case for temporary listeners

* Remove `Singleton` since `Thread.current[key]` is global (to the thread) anyway
* Add spec to assert temporary listeners are thread local
remove `publisher_class` method which is already in spec_helper. It appeared from the future after rewriting history using rebase.

* Allow temporary listeners to be specified as arguments instead of an array
* Add method to Wisper for adding temporary listeners
* Update README

Merge branch 'anonymous-class-in-specs'
Use anonymous classes with `Wisper::Publisher` included to create publishers in specs

Merge branch 'v2.0'
Despite the branch name, this isn't v2.0 since it has been made to be backwards compatible.
Instead of raising an exception when old syntax used handle it maintaining backwards compatibility, meaning we do not have to go to v2.0 yet.
Raise more descriptive exception message [ci skip]

Move development dependencies in Gemfile in to a 'development' group.

rename module which is included from Wisper to Wisper::Publisher

`#listeners` returns all listeners, both local and global.
freeze the collection returned by `#listeners` (since mutating it will not have the desired effect)
